miniapp.name: JoJo Stand Maker
miniapp.subtitle: 觉醒你的链上&社交 Stand
miniapp.description: Upload your photo to awaken your unique JoJo Stand! AI analyzes your Farcaster profile and on-chain activity to generate a personalized Stand with custom stats, abilities, and Araki-style artwork.
miniapp.tagline: Awaken Your Stand. Unleash Your Power.
miniapp.ogTitle: I Just Awakened My JoJo Stand!
miniapp.ogDescription: Upload your photo and discover your unique Stand based on your Farcaster profile and on-chain data. What's your Stand's power?
